content:
Sure, here are 25 funny prompts with those details:

1. A close-up shot of a lion with a goofy expression, wearing a pair of oversized sunglasses in a galaxy color.
2. A full-body picture of a panther in a tutu and ballet shoes, practicing its dance moves against a colorful galaxy backdrop.
3. An artistic shot of an ape wearing a top hat and monocle, sipping a cup of tea in a whimsical galaxy-themed tea party.
4. A close-up shot of a cat wearing a glittery top hat and bow tie, looking dapper in a galaxy-themed fashion shoot.
5. A full-body picture of a kitty wearing a superhero cape, posing with a serious expression in a galaxy-themed comic book cover.
6. A dramatic shot of a dog wearing a galaxy-patterned spacesuit, exploring the cosmos in a hilarious sci-fi adventure.
7. A portrait of a tiger wearing a pair of nerd glasses, reading a book on astrophysics in a galaxy-themed library.
8. A full-length picture of a leopard wearing a cowboy hat, riding a toy horse in a hilarious Wild West spoof.
9. An artistic shot of a gorilla wearing a wizard's hat and robe, casting spells in a whimsical galaxy-themed wizarding world.
10. A close-up shot of a wolf wearing a party hat, surrounded by colorful confetti in a galaxy-themed celebration.
11. A full-body picture of a cheetah wearing a chef's hat, cooking up a storm in a galaxy-themed cooking show.
12. A dramatic shot of a bear wearing a superhero costume, battling space villains in a hilarious galactic adventure.
13. A portrait of a fox wearing a detective hat and holding a magnifying glass, solving mysteries in a galaxy-themed noir story.
14. A full-length picture of a horse wearing a mermaid tail, swimming in a galaxy-themed underwater world.
15. A close-up shot of an eagle wearing a pirate hat and eyepatch, sailing the galaxy seas in search of treasure.
16. An artistic shot of a dolphin wearing a tiara, ruling over a kingdom of underwater galaxies in a hilarious fairytale.
17. A portrait of an owl wearing a graduation cap, delivering a hilarious galaxy-themed commencement speech.
18. A full-body picture of a giraffe wearing a superhero mask, striking a heroic pose in a galaxy-themed action scene.
19. A dramatic shot of a crocodile wearing a detective trench coat, solving a galaxy-themed mystery in a hilarious film noir spoof.
20. A close-up shot of a snake wearing a crown, sitting on a throne in a galaxy-themed kingdom.
21. A full-length picture of a kangaroo wearing a chef's apron, serving up delicious galaxy-themed meals in a hilarious cooking show.
22. An artistic shot of a seagull wearing a top hat and cane, tap dancing in a galaxy-themed musical extravaganza.
23. A portrait of a chimpanzee wearing a space helmet, flying a galaxy-themed spaceship in a hilarious sci-fi adventure.
24. A full-body picture of a polar bear wearing a tutu and ballet shoes, performing a hilarious dance routine in a galaxy-themed ballet.
25. A dramatic shot of a lioness wearing a queen's crown, sitting on a throne and ruling over a hilarious galaxy-themed kingdom.
